acceptance_criteria: Drawer opens/closes smoothly, all tick fields display correctly, close event fires on X or overlay click
closed_reason: Created tick-detail-drawer.ts using Shoelace sl-drawer (420px width, placement=end). Displays all tick fields: ID, title, type, priority, status, description, parent epic link, blockers list with links, labels, created/updated/closed timestamps, notes list. Emits 'drawer-close' on hide and 'tick-link-click' for navigation. Follows existing component patterns (tick-card.ts) for styling and event handling.
